poemsDataJson.list_full: 小倉山(をぐらやま) 峰(みね)のもみぢ葉(ば) 心(こころ)あらば 今(いま)ひとたびの みゆき待(ま)たなむ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: If the maple leaves//On Ogura mountain//Could only have hearts,//They would longingly await//The emperor's pilgrimage.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Ogura-yama|Mine no momiji-ba|Kokoro araba|Ima hitotabi no|Miyuki matanan
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: いまひとたひの みゆきまたなむ
poemsDataJson.author: 貞信公(ていしんこう)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 紅葉の美しさへの賛美と、散らずにいてほしい願望
